notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.

The invisibility is lost upon reaching the cast point of abilities, or upon finishing an attack (for ranged heroes upon projectile launch). This means if the attack misses, the invisibility is still lost.
This means if the attack misses, the invisibility is still lost.
abilities.description: Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

additionalInformation: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance. Increases all heroes' total magic resistance to 40%.
Increases all heroes' total magic resistance to 40%.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of evasion. Increases most heroes against physical attacks by 25%.
Increases most heroes against physical attacks by 25%.
name: Trickster Cloak
description: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.
